name: Circle
description:
3.Genre

Nurturing and Adventure Game.

4.About

It is a game that nurtures “Circle”.
You must go out for the "Circle".
You must procure foods for the "Circle".
You must love the "Circle" for yourself.
There are some psychological fear expression.

5.Game flow

In this game, there're some part of playing.

Nurture part
In this part, you can love your "Circle" for stroking and praising.
And if you had any foods, you can feed it to your "Circle".
These action will make "Circle" happier.

Adventure part
For nurturing your "Circle", you must procure its meals.
In the "Outside" of the room, there're some terrible enemies, and some foods seemed like memo.
Before the time expired, go back to your room with foods if that is possible.

Reception part
When you return to your room, strange humans may visit there.
If you saw them, you must respond.
"Who are you?" "What are you doing?" "What do you like?"
Through the limited questions, please understand their speculation.

6.Contact

If you had a interest to "Nanasi Project",
please contact to us through the website or Twitter.
We can react to you in our ugly English.
